statements: DELETE FROM election_data WHERE voting_district = 5 AND vote_timestamp < '2022-01-01 00:00:00'
DELETE FROM election_voters WHERE voter_id = 101 AND party_affiliation = 'Independent';
DELETE FROM election_results WHERE election_year = 2020 AND election_round = 2 AND votes_received < 1000;
DELETE FROM election_votes WHERE voter_id = 101 AND candidate_id = 201;
DELETE FROM votes WHERE voter_id = 100 AND candidate_id = 200;
DELETE FROM votes WHERE election_id = 300 AND vote_id = 400;
DELETE FROM voters WHERE age > 30 AND party_affiliation = 'Independent';
